member.name: T:VTOLAPI
member.summary: This is the VTOL VR Modding API which aims to simplify repetitive tasks.

member.name: P:VTOLAPI.instance
member.summary: This is the current instance of the API in the game world.

member.name: F:VTOLAPI.SceneLoaded
member.summary: This gets invoked when the scene has changed and finished loading. This should be the safest way to start running code when a level is loaded.

member.name: F:VTOLAPI.MissionReloaded
member.summary: This gets invoked when the mission as been reloaded by the player.

member.name: P:VTOLAPI.currentScene
member.summary: The current scene which is active.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.GetSteamID
member.summary: Returns the steam ID of the player which is using this mod.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.SteamId
member.summary: Returns the steam ID of the player which is using this mod.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.GetSteamName
member.summary: Returns the current name of the steam user, if they change their name during play session, this doesn't update.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.SteamName
member.summary: Returns the current name of the steam user, if they change their name during play session, this doesn't update.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.GetPlayersVehicleGameObject
member.summary: [MP Supported] Searches for the game object of the player by using the prefab name appending (Clone). For multiplayer it uses the lobby manager to get the local player

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.GetPlayersVehicleEnum
member.summary: Returns which vehicle the player is using in a Enum.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.CreateSettingsMenu(Settings)
member.summary: Creates a settings page in the `mod settings` tab. Make sure to fully create your settings before calling this as you can't change it onces it's created.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.GetUsersMods
member.summary: Returns a list of mods which are currently loaded

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.GetUsersOrderedMods
member.summary: Returns an ordered string of mods which are currently loaded

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.WaitForScenarioReload
member.summary: Please don't use this, this is for the mod loader only.

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.RegisterMod(VTOLMOD)
member.summary: You need to Register your mod before you start setting values inside your Shared Data

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.SetValue(VTOLMOD,System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Sets a value for your mods shared data.
member.param: The key you want to use. if it's already existing, it will be overridden
the value you want to set it to
if it was successful in setting it

member.name: M:VTOLAPI.GetValue(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean@,System.Object@,VTOLAPI.ErrorResult@)
member.summary: Gets a value stored in the Mod Shared Data inside the API
member.param: The name of the mod. CASE SENSITIVE
The stored value inside the dictionary if it was there. This will be null if it wasn't found
Reason why it couldn't find the key, this will be None if it was found

If we are checking through the users My Projects Folder

member.name: T:Mod
member.summary: The information stored about a mod which is used by the mod loader and can be used by mods with the API command GetUsersMods

member.name: F:Mod.name
member.summary: The name of the mod which displays on the mods page.

member.name: F:Mod.description
member.summary: The description of the mod which displays when the mod is selected.

member.name: F:Mod.dllPath
member.summary: The location of the .dll file of this mod.

member.name: F:Mod.isLoaded
member.summary: If the mod is currently loaded.

member.name: F:Mod.ModFolder
member.summary: The folder which the mods dll and other files are stored.

member.name: T:VTOLMOD
member.summary: Base Class for any mod so that the mod loader knows what class to load.

member.name: P:VTOLMOD.ThisMod
member.summary: Storing the Mods data in a class

member.name: P:VTOLMOD.ModFolder
member.summary: Gets the folder which this current dll is located. Returns string.Empty if "ThisMod" is null

member.name: M:VTOLMOD.ModLoaded
member.summary: The method which gets called when the mod is loaded.

member.name: M:VTOLMOD.Log(System.Object)
member.summary: Logs a message to the console with your mod name.

member.name: M:VTOLMOD.LogWarning(System.Object)
member.summary: Logs a warning message to the console with your mod name.

member.summary: Logs a error message to the console with your mod name.
